newTasks.title: Core Economic Engine with Money Conservation
newTasks.description: Implement the foundational economic engine that tracks all money flows with strict conservation laws. No money can appear or disappear mysteriously.
newTasks.details:
Build the EconomicEngine class that:
- Tracks all transactions with source/destination
- Implements money conservation validation
- Calculates supply/demand dynamics
- Models inflation and interest rates
- Maintains balance sheets for all entities
- Provides audit trails for all money movements
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify money conservation laws hold across all operations. Test that total money in system remains constant unless explicitly created/destroyed through defined mechanisms.

newTasks.title: Population & Demographics Engine
newTasks.description: Create a comprehensive population simulation with individual citizens who have realistic psychological profiles and respond to incentives.
newTasks.details:
Implement PopulationEngine with:
- Individual citizen modeling with age, education, profession, income
- Psychological factors: risk tolerance, entrepreneurial spirit, mobility willingness
- Motivation and fear systems that drive decision-making
- Response to job opportunities, tax incentives, grants
- Career progression and skill development
- Realistic life events and transitions
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify citizens respond logically to incentives. Test that population demographics evolve realistically over time. Validate psychological factors influence decisions appropriately.

newTasks.title: Profession & Industry System
newTasks.description: Model realistic professions with different earning potentials, skill requirements, and career paths.
newTasks.details:
Create comprehensive profession system:
- Define all major professions with realistic salary ranges
- Model skill requirements and education prerequisites
- Implement career progression paths
- Track unemployment rates by industry, education, age, region
- Model job market dynamics and labor mobility
- Include small business and entrepreneurship opportunities
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify profession salaries match real-world data. Test that unemployment rates respond to economic conditions. Validate career progression follows realistic patterns.

newTasks.title: Small Business & Entrepreneurship Engine
newTasks.description: Implement a comprehensive small business ecosystem where citizens can start and run businesses.
newTasks.details:
Build small business system:
- Business creation process with realistic requirements
- Financial tracking with cash flow, assets, liabilities
- Business success/failure modeling based on market conditions
- Employee hiring and management
- Competition and market dynamics
- Government regulations and compliance
- Access to loans, grants, and investment
newTasks.testStrategy: Test business creation and failure rates match real-world statistics. Verify financial tracking maintains money conservation. Validate market competition affects business success.

newTasks.title: City Specialization & Geography Engine
newTasks.description: Create realistic cities that develop economic specializations based on geography, resources, and advantages.
newTasks.details:
Implement CityEngine with:
- City specialization in mining, entertainment, tech, finance, etc.
- Geographic advantages and resource deposits
- Infrastructure development and transport links
- Quality of life factors affecting attractiveness
- Economic indicators per city (GDP, unemployment, income)
- Urban growth and development patterns
- Inter-city trade and economic relationships
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify cities develop logical specializations based on advantages. Test that infrastructure investments improve economic outcomes. Validate quality of life affects migration patterns.

newTasks.title: Immigration & Migration System
newTasks.description: Model realistic population movement including legal immigration, illegal immigration, and internal migration.
newTasks.details:
Create comprehensive migration system:
- Legal immigration with visa processes and quotas
- Illegal immigration with enforcement consequences
- Internal migration based on economic opportunities
- Cultural and social factors affecting movement
- Integration challenges and outcomes
- Economic impacts of migration on origin/destination areas
- Policy effects on migration flows
newTasks.testStrategy: Test migration responds to economic incentives and policy changes. Verify legal/illegal immigration flows are realistic. Validate cultural factors influence migration decisions.

newTasks.title: AI Analysis & Interpretation Engine
newTasks.description: Implement AI-powered analysis that provides natural language interpretation of economic and social dynamics.
newTasks.details:
Build AIAnalysisEngine with:
- Pre-simulation analysis of current situation
- Trend prediction and impact assessment
- Post-simulation interpretation of results
- Narrative event generation
- Policy impact analysis and suggestions
- Natural language explanations of complex economic phenomena
- Integration with deterministic calculations
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify AI analysis provides accurate and insightful interpretations. Test that predictions align with simulation outcomes. Validate narrative generation is coherent and relevant.

newTasks.title: Incentive Response System
newTasks.description: Model how citizens realistically respond to various economic and policy incentives.
newTasks.details:
Implement IncentiveEngine with:
- Job opportunity responses with realistic delays and probabilities
- Tax incentive responses based on citizen characteristics
- Business incentive responses for entrepreneurs
- Education incentive responses
- Grant and subsidy responses
- Risk assessment and decision-making models
- Time delays and behavioral inertia
newTasks.testStrategy: Test incentive responses match real-world behavioral economics. Verify response rates and delays are realistic. Validate different citizen types respond differently to same incentives.

newTasks.title: Fear & Motivation Psychology Engine
newTasks.description: Implement realistic human psychology modeling including fears, motivations, and pleasure-seeking behavior.
newTasks.details:
Create PsychologyEngine with:
- Fear modeling (unemployment, poverty, crime, war, imprisonment)
- Motivation systems (wealth, career, family, status, fulfillment)
- Pleasure-seeking and lifestyle choices
- Risk tolerance and decision-making under uncertainty
- Social influence and peer effects
- Happiness and life satisfaction calculations
- Mental health impacts on economic behavior
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify psychological factors realistically influence economic decisions. Test that fear responses match behavioral research. Validate motivation systems drive appropriate behaviors.

newTasks.title: Real-Time Simulation Integration
newTasks.description: Integrate all systems into a cohesive real-time simulation loop with AI analysis → deterministic simulation → AI interpretation.
newTasks.details:
Build comprehensive SimulationLoop:
- AI pre-analysis of current situation
- Deterministic economic and social calculations
- AI post-interpretation of results
- Event generation and narrative creation
- State persistence and validation
- Performance optimization for real-time operation
- Error handling and recovery mechanisms
newTasks.testStrategy: Test full simulation loop runs efficiently in real-time. Verify all systems integrate correctly. Validate state persistence and recovery work properly. Test performance under load.

newTasks.title: Economic Metrics & Analytics Dashboard
newTasks.description: Create comprehensive economic analytics and visualization for the realistic economic simulation.
newTasks.details:
Build analytics system for:
- Unemployment rates by demographics and regions
- Income distribution and inequality metrics
- Business creation and failure rates
- Migration flows and patterns
- City economic performance comparisons
- Policy impact measurements
- Real-time economic health indicators
- Historical trend analysis and forecasting
newTasks.testStrategy: Verify metrics accurately reflect simulation state. Test dashboard updates in real-time. Validate historical data tracking and trend analysis. Test policy impact measurements.

newTasks.title: Policy Impact Simulation
newTasks.description: Implement realistic policy effects that influence citizen behavior and economic outcomes through the comprehensive simulation.
newTasks.details:
Enhance PolicyEngine with:
- Tax policy effects on citizen behavior and business decisions
- Education policy impacts on skill development and mobility
- Immigration policy effects on population flows
- Business regulation impacts on entrepreneurship
- Social welfare policy effects on work incentives
- Infrastructure investment impacts on city development
- Realistic time delays and implementation challenges
newTasks.testStrategy: Test policies produce realistic behavioral changes. Verify policy effects match real-world research. Validate time delays and implementation challenges are modeled correctly.
